data.title: ui::Checkbox inside ui::Scrollview bug
data.body:
如果在ui::ScrollView中放ui::CheckBox，点中ui::CheckBox滑动后，会滑动ScrollView，而松手后依然会出发ui::CheckBox事件。
3.2上没有这个问题，3.2和3.8的ui::Button不会出现这种问题。查看了下3.8的源码，发现CheckBox做了较大修改，现在继承自AbstractCheckButton而不是直接继承自Widget，并且重写了onTouchEnded这个函数，这样点击事件似乎就绕过了Widget，直接由CheckBox自身做处理，没有像以前那样做是否“打断”的判断。

data.title: Update cocos2d-js web submodule to latest.
crystax-ndk-10.3.0 needs <stdint.h> to be included in cocos/ui/UIWebViewImpl-android.h.
ios上3d模型加光照与listview冲突，死机
no more uthash
data.body:
Instead of using two `uthash` entires, it uses two `unordered_map<>` entries.
Benefits are:
- easier to debug. I can inspect the contents of the `unorderd_map` with the
  debugger
- less memory. I don't need to allocate two `proxies`. I only allocate one `proxy` and I added it into both `maps`

If also fixes an important bug when unrooting objects. Unroot was
cleaning the heap object. So now proxy adds a `_jsobj`, which is a raw
pointer. Needed under certain cases.

Adds a new `jsb_remove_proxy()` function that only takes one `proxy` as argument. Old one is still supported.

data.title: Fix  #14428 CCRenderTexture does not work properly on some devices wh…
data.body: Fix  #14428 CCRenderTexture does not work properly on some devices which do not support "GL_OES_packed_depth_stencil".

data.title: Replaced uthash...
data.body:
Instead of using two uthash entires, it uses two `unordered_map` entries.
Benefits are:
- easier to debug. I can inspect the contents of the `unorderd_map` with the debugger
- less memory. I don't need to allocate two proxies. I only allocate one proxy and I added it into both maps

If also fixes an important bug when unrooting objects. Unroot was cleaning the heap object. So now proxy adds a _jsobj, which is a raw pointer. Needed under certain cases.

data.title: Implement Full GC Relied memory model
data.body:
Related bindings generator PR: https://github.com/cocos2d/bindings-generator/pull/217

@ricardoquesada I just migrated my solution based on your modifications, haven't got time to run through the test, may have compilation issues too, but please take a look already, I will make it working tomorrow.

In the old PR, I have explained my solution, maybe you can get a clearer idea in the comments: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14224

Essential codes are in the first commit, 
the third one applies the solution to manual bindings, 
the fourth one is very important, it shows how and which native references are passed to script scope

data.title: Presenting Android Java activity results in messed up render state
data.body:
I'm presenting a native fullscreen Java activity on top of the cocos2dxactivity. That works fine, however, when I dismiss the activity the renderer seems to mess up the game (mainly missing fonts, but on some devices it also shows random assets fullscreen).

Works fine on iOS, seems to be an Android renderer issue. I tried pausing the mainloop it before displaying the activity, and unpausing afterwards, but that doesn't seem to work. Neither does disabling hardwareAccelerated for the application in the AndroidManifest.

Any ideas?

data.title: AutoPolygen should support reading sprites from spriteFrameCache
data.body: So far `AutoPolygon` supports creating from sprites,but since in most production games sprites are loaded from plist,It is only logical that we also have option of creating Polygon Sprites using `SpriteFrameCache`

data.title: Fix a 'heap use after free' crash in ActionManager::update.
data.body: In some circumstances it was possible to get the ActionManager to access a hash element that had been destroyed due to certain cleanup patterns in user code. This may result in random crashes depending on the environment and how strictly it treats invalid memory access. This change fixes the crash and adds a test case to reproduce the original crash without the fix applied. Note: on iOS you should enable the Xcode 'address sanitizer' feature in the Xcode Scheme in order to reproduce this crash more easily; it may be difficult to reproduce otherwise, especially for debug builds.

data.title: call removeTexture, memory can not be released.
data.body: when I call Director::getInstance()->getTextureCache()->removeTexture(key), if texture format is png, memory will not be released. if format is jpg, memory can be released.

data.title: fix setflip for batch sprite
data.body: Since we use _quad.bl, _quad.br, _quad.tl, _quad.tr, we should modify the texture coordinates of it according to flip flag.
